summarize.description: Summarize the transcription of the meeting

track_participation.description: Identify the participants of the meeting.

collect_action_items.description: Identify the action items to be performed before the next meeting.

track_qna.description: Identify the questions asked by a participant and corresponding answers.
track_qna.expected_output: A list of question and answer pair

answer_questions.expected_output: An answer to the question, or a mention that documents don't contain the answer.
